speaker: cat
dialog: how long does this place extend? sheesh

speaker: cat
dialog: WAIT A MINUTE! I DIDN'T IMAGINE THAT...?!
No, you did not. Anyway, little creacher, I would like to congratulate you on entering hell!
NO, YOU CLOWN. YOU CAN'T DIE IN A GAME WITHOUT HEALTH POINTS OR COMBAT!

speaker: cat
dialog: Good point. Anyway, how do I get out of hell? Is this even like actual hell? All I remember is getting bonked by a coconut...
Indeed you did get bonked by a coconut and thus, conked out cold. You friends are trying to shake you awake. I think Mole's thinking about splashing beachwater on your face.
Ok, ok, sheesh. You're lucky hell got scrapped or else you all would have been in for a VERY BAD TIME. Anyway. This stage is really short.
Anyway, just keep walking down the corridor. That's it. I hope you enjoyed this free trial -- a wee sample -- of hell :3

speaker: cat
dialog: Gosh, i wonder how many NPCS got dragged down to hell...? Like those poor anchovies...
